channel.title: Saradomin Spec [317]

item.title: Saradomin Spec [317]
item.dc:creator: @iLuckyBeaTz iLuckyBeaTz
item.description:
@iLuckyBeaTz wrote:

This is a delta base source 317

I want my saradomin sword to hit twice when it specs, The gfx and special amount it uses is correct but it only hits once.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8100 && specialAmount > 99){ specialAtk(true, 100, 600, 5637); AttackingOn2.specGFX(658); AttackingOn2.specGFX(732); getHit(5); usingSpecial = true; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit+10); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Thats the code for it. Any help?

Read full topic
